name: Sword

description: A sturdy wooden shield for protection.

description: A wand that can cast magical spells.

description: A heavy iron shield offering excellent protection.

name: Bow
description: A long-range weapon, perfect for precision shots.

description: A bundle of arrows for the bow.

name: Healing Salve
description: A salve that heals a small amount of health.

description: Armor crafted from dragon scales, offering unmatched defense.

description: A magical staff that controls fire.

description: A full set of metal plate armor for maximum protection.

description: An elixir that temporarily boosts strength.

name: Magic Ring
description: A ring imbued with magical powers.

name: Phoenix Feather
description: A rare feather from a phoenix that can restore life.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A small but sharp dagger, perfect for quick strikes.

name: Magic Potion
description: A potion that replenishes mana for spellcasting.

name: Crossbow

name: Crossbow Bolts
description: A set of bolts for use with the crossbow.
